did.abstract: A draft of a New York State income tax return by Guthman, an engineer employed by the City of New York who resided on Ocean Avenue in Brooklyn. The document is dated 1946.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Source and date of acquisition unknown. The item was formally accessioned in 1977.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This two-page document has no particular arrangement.

bioghist.head: Biographical note
bioghist.p: Joel I. Guthman was born January 8, 1907 in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania to Isaac Guthman and Jennie Leah Guthman. He was Jewish and grew up in Brooklyn. He served in the New York National Guard during World War II. In 1941, he married Belle Goldberg.
Guthman worked for the city of New York as an engineer. He was "deeply interested in Brooklyn lore" and collected Brooklyn history material as a hobby.
